scripts.build:clean: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build
scripts.dev: pnpm run build --projects=sdks/** && nx watch --projects=sdks/** -- pnpm run build --projects=sdks/**
scripts.dev:integrations: pnpm run build --projects=integrations/** && nx watch --projects=integrations/** -- pnpm run build --projects=integrations/**
scripts.dev:middlewares: pnpm run build --projects=middlewares/** && nx watch --projects=middlewares/** -- pnpm run build --projects=middlewares/**
scripts.test:watch: nx run-many -t test && nx watch --all -- nx run-many -t test
scripts.publish: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm publish -r --filter='./sdks/typescript/packages/*'
scripts.publish:integrations: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm publish -r --filter='./integrations/*'
scripts.publish:alpha: pnpm run clean && pnpm install && pnpm run build && pnpm publish -r --no-git-checks --filter='./sdks/typescript/packages/*' --tag alpha
